pipelines.name: rtsp_camera_pipeline
pipelines.pipeline: rtspsrc location=rtsp://<rtsp-camera-username>:<rtsp-camera-password>@<rtsp-camera-url> latency=100 ! rtph264depay ! gvapython class=PTPFrameTimeStamp function=process module=/home/pipeline-server/ptp_frame_timestamp.py name=ntp ! h264parse ! decodebin ! videoscale ! video/x-raw, width=1920, height=1080 ! videoconvert ! gvadetect name=detection model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvawatermark ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination
